description:
We're back tonight with more (oh, so much more!) of last week's War Chest recruit, Zander.

My trip to Wal-Mart really paid off and this stud was such a great find. I told you in last week's letter how he was moving along pretty fast and this week we're sharing a little of that with you in the War Chest Update.

Now, it's very rare that I get my hand in the picture in any of our videos and only a few guys over the years have been able to persuade me to do so. Lucky for you (and me) Zander is one of those guys!

I couldn't help myself. The temptation was just too great. I've got a weak spot for this hottie and when I got the green light to move in, I took it without any hesitation. Stroking that nice, fat cock of his wasn't enough. I'd been wanting to explore that nice ass of his since I first laid eyes on it and I figured I'd go ahead and take my chance. After I stroke him for awhile I turn him around and spread that bubble butt wide open so we can get ourselves a long, extended look at that beautiful pink pucker.

By the time I turn him back around and get my hands on his cock again, it doesn't take long before he's spewing out a huge load all over the place   my hand included. Check it out in the War Chest and keep your eyes open for more of this new recruit in the very near future.
title: Zander
